name: Knead a Hand
description:
Join the snow covered world of Brie and discover the connections you make with others, while avoiding those pesky work assignments!

It was developed over a Game Jam hosted by Women in Gaming in May 2021. The theme was "Connection."

Controls
  •  In order to move around use W/A/S/D
  •  Hold SPACE to interact with objects
  •  ESC to see options
The Team

Nyla Laurie - Character Art and UI Design

Jacqueline Kik - Environment Art and Props

Michelle Hallmann - Programming

Enya Funke - Programming

Natali Panic-Cidic - Narrative Design and Project Management
